TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "更新" 按钮 (其`CommandName`属性设置为 "Update") 时, 控件将引发事件, 但在控件更新记录后。 The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法, 该方法执行自定义例程, 如在此事件发生时检查更新操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象将传递到事件处理方法, 该方法允许你确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受更新操作影响的记录数, 请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用属性可确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置属性, 指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果需要访问已更新记录的原始键字段值, 请使用属性。If you need to access the original key field values for the updated record, use the property. 使用属性可以访问原始的非键字段值。The original non-key field values can be accessed by using the property. 如果你允许用户编辑关键字字段, 则更新的值 (包括更新的密钥字段值) 将使用属性进行访问。Updated values (which include updated key field values, if you allow the user to edit key fields) are accessed using the property. 默认情况下, 该控件返回到更新操作后由属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 当处理在更新操作过程中发生的异常时, 可以通过 将属性设置为`true`, 使控件处于编辑模式。When handling an exception that occurred during the update operation, you can keep the control in edit mode by setting the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用传递给事件的事件处理方法的对象来确定是否在更新操作过程中发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 affectedRows, class System.Exception e) cil managed
Public Sub New (affectedRows As Integer, e As Exception)

param.name: affectedRows
param.span: 受更新操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，表示在执行更新操作时引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception raised when the update operation was performed.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception is raised, use for this parameter.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||参数中包含的对象 `e` 。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the update operation.

value.span: 受更新操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可确定受更新操作影响的记录数。Use the property to determine the number of records affected by the update operation. 此属性通常用于验证在下列情况下是否更新了正确的记录数:This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was updated in the following situations: - 验证是否只更新了单个记录。Verify that only a single record was updated. 有时, 编写不当的 update 语句可以更新多个记录。Sometimes an improperly written update statement can update multiple records. - 验证在不引发异常的更新操作过程中发生错误时是否已更新记录。Verify that a record was updated when an error occurs during the update operation that does not raise an exception. - 验证在支持冲突检测 (乐观并发检查) 的数据源控件 ( 如和控件) 的数据源控件将`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`其属性设置为枚举值时是否已更新记录.Verify that a record was updated when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency checking), such as the and controls, has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此设置下, 可能无法更新已由其他用户同时修改的记录。Under this setting, a record that has been modified by another user concurrently might not be updated. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来验证是否已更新记录。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to verify that a record was updated. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取更新操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示更新操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An object that represents the exception that was raised during the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可确定在更新操作过程中引发的异常 (如果有)。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常, 并且您决定在事件处理程序中处理异常, 请确保将属性设置为`true`; 否则, 控件将再次引发异常。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is thrown again by the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否在更新操作过程中发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在更新操作过程中引发异常时, 请使用属性指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 当此属性设置为`true`时, 该异常将被视为已处理, 且不会由控件再次引发。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not thrown again by the control. 如果将此属性设置为`false`, 则将再次引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is thrown again. 若要确定引发的异常, 请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInEditMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.KeepInEditMode : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作完成后 控件是否仍保持在编辑模式下。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 如果在更新操作之后仍处于编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 该控件返回到更新操作后由属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 使用属性指定控件是否应保持在编辑模式下。 Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in edit mode. 若要使控件处于编辑模式, 请将此属性`true`设置为。To keep the control in edit mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅在发生某种情况 (如引发的异常) 时才应使用, 此类要求控件的行为方式与正常情况不同。This property should be used only when a situation occurs (such as an exception being raised) that requires the control to behave differently than it normally would. 如果控件在默认情况下需要保持编辑模式, 请改为设置属性。 If the control needs to remain in edit mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性在发生异常时使控件处于编辑模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode when an exception occurs. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，该字典包含已更新记录的原始键字段的名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 包含一个字典，该字典由已更新记录的原始键字段的名称/值对组成。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the original key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含控件的属性中列出的键字段的原始值。 The property contains the original values of the key fields listed in the property of a control. 使用属性可访问已更新记录的键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. 例如, 你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. > [!NOTE] > 如果允许用户更新键字段的值, 则属性将包含原始键字段值。If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the property contains the original key field values. 更新的值存储在属性中。The updated values are stored in the property. 属性返回实现接口的对象。 The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. 若要访问字段名称, 请使用 对象的属性。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样, 可以使用属性访问字段值。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式, 还可以使用对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 依赖于字段顺序的数据源控件 (如) 只能通过索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性访问已更新记录的键字段的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，该字典包含已更新记录的新字段的名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 一个 ，包含被更新记录的新字段名称/值对字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问已更新记录的新字段值。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated record. 例如, 你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. > [!NOTE] > 如果允许用户更新键字段的值, 则属性将包含原始键字段值。If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the property contains the original key field values. 更新的值存储在属性中。The updated values are stored in the property. 属性返回实现接口的对象。 The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. 若要访问字段名称, 请使用 对象的属性。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样, 可以使用属性访问字段值。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式, 还可以使用对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 依赖于字段顺序的数据源控件 (如) 只能通过索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性访问用户为已更新记录的非键字段输入的新值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the new values entered by the user for the non-key fields of the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OldValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，该字典包含已更新记录的原始非键字段的名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original non-key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 一个 ，包含被更新记录的原始字段名称/值对字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问已更新记录的原始非键字段值。Use the property to access the original non-key field values for the updated record. 例如, 你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 支持冲突检测的数据源控件 (乐观并发检查), 如和控件, `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`其属性设置为, 还会将这些原始值与执行更新操作之前, 请在数据库中记录。A data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency checking), such as the and controls, with its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` also compares these original values against the record in the database before an update operation is performed. 如果记录已由其他用户同时修改, 则不会更新该记录。If a record has been modified by another user concurrently, the record is not updated. > [!NOTE] > 属性不包含键字段。The property does not contain key fields. 如果允许用户更新键字段的值, 则原始键字段值将存储在属性中。If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the original key field values are stored in the property. 更新的值存储在属性中。The updated values are stored in the property. 属性返回实现接口的对象。 The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. 若要访问字段名称, 请使用 对象的属性。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样, 可以使用属性访问字段值。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式, 还可以使用对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 依赖于字段顺序的数据源控件 (如) 只能通过索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性访问已更新记录的非键字段的原始值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the original values of the non-key fields for the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
